name: Raidraptor - Rudder Strix
desc: If this card is Normal Summoned, or Special Summoned from the hand by the effect of a "Raidraptor" card: You can inflict 600 damage to your opponent. When this card is targeted for an attack by an opponent's monster: You can Special Summon up to 2 "Raidraptor" monsters from your hand, and if you do, monsters your opponent controls cannot target the monster(s) Special Summoned by this effect for attacks for the rest of this turn.
